entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:07 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 02:05 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: NNE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle except drizzle near Lake Erie. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 01:10 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle changing to periods of drizzle near noon and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 01:10 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 01:10 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
